TopicTitle: "Continue" Button in Main Menu does not work,

Articles.Content:
This really sucks

Okay, I can "click" (where i click the option and it works) for all the options except "Continue" on a saved game.

I don't know if this is a mod bug or a KSP bug.

List of Approximate mods:

B9 maintained

SpaceY Lifters and Expanded

Chatterer

Ballutes

HyperEdit

FAR

ATM-Aggressive

Coherent Contracts

Cool Rockets

HotRockets

Deadly Reentry

Davon's Supply mod.

KIS

KAS

KJR

Extraplanetary Launchpads

Any help would be appreciated.
It cant be the game. Try taking out some mods and launch the game and continue that until you have found the mod that is causing the problem.
